message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.LinkedList' import. Should be before 'pl.plajerlair.commonsbox.minecraft.compat.XMaterial'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'pl.plajerlair.commonsbox.minecraft.compat.XMaterial'.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
